content.rendered:
Join us in celebrating our Earth for the weekend!

Cinema Verde 2023

See you at CinemaVerde’s Earth Day Weekend Events!

CinemaVerde is an environmental film festival and channel. We are hosting a three day Earth Day
celebration event April 21 to April 23, 2023.

Environmental awareness and education are at the core of our mission. Cinema Verde is here to lead the way to a sustainable future.”

— Trish Riley, Cinema Verde Director

GAINESVILLE, FLORIDA, USA, April 13, 2023/EINPresswire.com/ — Cinema Verde, a Florida-based environmental film festival and streaming channel, has announced a three-day Earth Day celebration set to take place from April 21st to 23rd, 2023. The event will feature a community clean-up event, a sustainable showcase, and an awards dinner, all with a focus on promoting environmental conservation and social responsibility.

https://www.cinemaverde.org/sizzle-reels/2023-earth-day-event-promo

April 21st, 2023, 5:30 pm – 7:30 pm: Ashley Creek Clean-up Event

The day will begin with a community clean-up event at Ashley Creek located just north of NW 19th Lane. This event is FREE to attend! All the necessary supplies, including gloves, bags, and tools to safely pick up litter and other debris in the designated areas have been generously provided by Keep Alachua County Beautiful. Attendees will also have the opportunity to learn about the impact of waste on the environment and the ways to make a difference. Afterward, attendees will meet at Swampboil, host of the clean-up after-party.

April 22nd, 2023, 4 pm – 7 pm: Sustainable Showcase

CinemaVerde is partnering with #UNLITTER UF to present a Sustainable Showcase and 2023 CinemaVerde festival films at Cypress & Grove. A wide range of organizations and vendors will be showcased, all with a shared commitment to protecting the environment and promoting social responsibility. Afterward, wind down at Cypress & Grove for a screening of the 2023 CinemaVerde festival films which will run until 10 pm. Bring friends and family for a great night of fun. This event is FREE to attend.

On April 23rd, 2023, 4 pm – 8 pm: Cinema Verde Awards Dinner at Passions Field

Spend an unforgettable evening hosted by Passions Field celebrating the talented filmmakers who showcased their inspiring work during CinemaVerde’s February film festival. This year’s dinner will take place at a beautiful flower farm, providing the perfect setting for an elegant and sustainable dining experience prepared by renowned chef Mark Newman of the iconic Leonardo’s 706 restaurant! Tickets and parking for this exclusive event are limited, so secure a spot at the table today for a night of unforgettable flavors, inspiring company, and the best of your favorite green cinema. We can’t wait to see you there! Bring a friend: Your 2nd ticket is half-price! As a token of gratitude, all tickets include an annual membership at Cinema Verde, a $60 value.

RSVP, buy tickets, or find more information at https://www.cinemaverde.org/events

And Congratulations to the Winners of the 14th Annual CinemaVerde International Environmental Film and Arts Festival 2023.

Event Reel

Awards Reel

​CinemaVerde is a Florida nonprofit corporation designated as a 501(c)(3) public charity by the IRS: Contributions may be tax deductible. Solicitation License# CH33749. Thank you for your support.

www.CinemaVerde.org

Trish Riley
CinemaVerde
Trish@CinemaVerde.Org
Visit us on social media:
Facebook
Twitter
LinkedIn
Instagram
YouTube
TikTok

Earth Day Weekend Reel

You just read:

News Provided By

April 13, 2023, 19:11 GMT


EIN Presswire’s priority is source transparency. We do not allow opaque clients, and our editors try to be careful about weeding out false and misleading content.
As a user, if you see something we have missed, please do bring it to our attention. Your help is welcome. EIN Presswire, Everyone’s Internet News Presswire,
tries to define some of the boundaries that are reasonable in today’s world. Please see our
Editorial Guidelines
for more information.



Originally published at https://www.einpresswire.com/article/627209259/celebrate-earth-day-with-cinemaverde
